725165f-b.text:
27th Street, west side, north from near Ditmars Boulevard, showing the grounds of the Seacrest Sanitarium, formely [sic] the River Crest Sanitarium. View 2 is in the opposite direction (north) from near 21st Avenue.
P. L. Sperr  May 27, 1934
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2:

725165f-a.text:
27th Street, west side, north from near Ditmars Boulevard, showing the grounds of the Seacrest Sanitarium, formely [sic] the River Crest Sanitarium. View 2 is in the opposite direction (north) from near 21st Avenue.
P. L. Sperr  May 27, 1934
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2:

725166f-a.text:
27th Street, w.s., s. fr. Ditmars Blvd, showing the grounds of the Seacrest Sanitorium, formerly the River Crest Sanitorium. View 2 [the photograph shown here] is in the opposite direction from near 21st Avenue.

P.L. Speer, photographer
May 27, 1924

(The duplicate print of view 2 has been mounted with ----[?] materials because the original print is deteriorating. June 22[?], 1973)
